text: Director of the Central Intelligence Agency (D/CIA) serves as the head of the Central Intelligence Agency, which is part of the United States Intelligence Community. He/She reports to the Director of National Intelligence (DNI). The Director is assisted by the Deputy Director of the Central Intelligence Agency. The Director is nominated by the President, with the concurring or nonconcurring recommendation from the Director of National Intelligence 50 Title 403–6. Appointment of officials responsible for intelligence-related activities] and must be confirmed by majority vote from the Senate. 50 Title 403–4a. Director of the Central Intelligence Agency ==List of directors== What follows is a list of Directors of the Central Intelligence Agency (in chronological order). No. Image Name Start End President President 1 (2001–2009) 2 (2001–2009) 3 (2009–2017) – (2009–2017) 4 (2009–2017) – (2009–2017) 5 (2009–2017) – (2017–2021) 6 (2017–2021) 7 (2017–2021) – (2021–2025) 8 (2021–2025) – (2025–present) 9 present (2025–present) ==References==
title: Director of the Central Intelligence Agency
